sentence.Network_en: Reagan's speech was met with incredulity in the US.
sentence.Network_cn: 里根的演讲在美国遭到了质疑。

sentence.Network_en: The Vicar looked at him with open-mouthed incredulity.
sentence.Network_cn: 教区牧师目瞪口呆地看着他，露出不相信的表情。

sentence.Network_en: At the beginning he had no feeling except sheer incredulity.
sentence.Network_cn: 开始时他没有感觉,只觉得全然没法子相信.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... incorruptible (道德上)不受腐蚀的 incredulity 怀疑，不相信 increment 增值，增加.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... incredible 不可信的 incredulity 不相信 increment 增加.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... （cred 相信+ incredulity a " 不轻信 ) encrypt v 加密.
Unit6 book1 ... incredulous a. 不相信的，不肯相信的 incredulity n. 不信，怀疑 an instrument for writing 书写工具.

list.abs: the story Bill told us was incredible and so we were incredulous about it .比尔给我们讲的那个故事令人难以置信，因此我们心存怀疑。
I am wholly incredulous of the truth of his story .我根本不相信他说的是真话。
four pairs of incredulous eyes looked at me as I pro ceeded to open the refrigerator .四双惊讶的眼睛看着我打开了冰箱。
He asked me with an incredulous look ., 他用怀疑的神情问我.

entry.def: If someone reacts with incredulity to something, they are unable to believe it because it is very surprising or shocking.

example.ex: The announcement has been met with incredulity...
example.tran: 通告受到了人们的质疑。

example.ex: The Vicar looked at him with open-mouthed incredulity.
example.tran: 教区牧师目瞪口呆地看着他,露出不相信的表情。

means.word_mean: 1. doubt about the truth of something

auth_sentence.content: Misplaced credulity isn't much better than misplaced incredulity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Misplaced credulity isn't much better than misplaced incredulity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Misplaced credulity isn't much better than misplaced incredulity.

auth_sentence.content: She said this with a drunk's sad incredulity.
auth_sentence.res_content: She said this with a drunk's sad incredulity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She said this with a drunk's sad incredulity.

auth_sentence.content: Your personal incredulity is not a rational argument.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your personal incredulity is not a rational argument.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your personal incredulity is not a rational argument.

stems_affixes.word_buile: cred相信+ible能……的→adj.可靠的,可信的
cred相信,信任+ulous多……的→相信太多→轻信的
in不+credulous[adj.轻信的,易信的]→adj.怀疑的, 不轻信的
cred相信,信任+it表抽象名词→ n.&v.信任;贷款;n.学分
cred相信,信任+ential表形容词或名词→让人相信的东西→凭据
credulous[[adj.轻信的,易信的]]→n.易信, 轻信
cred相信,信任+it表抽象名词→ n.&v.信任;贷款;n.学分
ac给予+credit[ n.&v.信任;贷款;n.学分]→给予相信→委托
dis不+credit[ n.&v.信任;贷款;n.学分]→v.不信任,怀疑
